short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checklist before that crucial PUBLISH button to make sure you dont mess up the release!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension lets you add a checklist, which will be reminded to you if you publish your Android app live. You need to manually select each task in order to publish the app!
This is extremely important because we being devs often forget some important task in the build and push it live by mistake!
